messages.content:
U: I want a shortlist. find alternatives with the same vibe using the context cues: brand, color, category, and layout. Stay within the context and search for similar items only.
A: Do you want shopping-style search terms, or a grounded description first?
U: Prioritize the main product look and feel.

Using the context as the source of truth, I see Beacon teal matte notebook at near_center, Beacon matte notebook in teal at near_center, and matte Beacon notebook in teal at near_center. I will run a shallow shopping search based on the image context. I will keep it grounded in the provided context and avoid adding new objects.
